concept.title: Element domains
concept.shortdesc:
Elements in DITA are arranged into domains for
purposes and technical reasons.

conbody.p: The base DITA elements are grouped into domains. You can see this clearly in the .

The DITA element mark-up domains are:
programming
user interface
software
utilities
metadata
typographic

Different sets of elements are intended for use when documenting different types of things. The software domain, for example, contains the elements designed to semantically describe software characteristics.

The element domains are technically
into different DTD or XSD schema modules.
